name: okc ruby
blurb: OKC Ruby is focused on helping Oklahoma Rubyists to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: OKC LUGnuts

name: Tulsa Web Devs
blurb: Tulsa Web Devs are on a mission to make Tulsa one of the best cities in the world for web developers.

name: Code for Tulsa
blurb: We are a Code for America brigade improving Tulsa - one commit at a time.

name: Code Norman
blurb: This group is for people who like to code, who like to talk about code, or cannot seem to stop thinking about computers.

name: Code for OKC

name: okc#
blurb: OKC# is a .Net centric usergroup located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Oklahoma City is an emerging technology hub with hundreds of .Net developers working in the area.
